features: All-weather protection: The 20k/20k fabric is waterproof, extremely breathable and PFC free
Outdoor versatile: Inspired by running, this minimalist jacket lends itself to an array of outdoor activities
Active comfort: With 4-way stretch and an elasticated hood, this jacket is also really comfy

AdvancedSkin Dry 20K/20K: AdvancedSkin Dry 20K/20K is the ultimate protection against rain, snow and wind, with great breathability to keep you comfortable. AdvancedSkin Dry 20K/20K provides 20,000mm waterproofness and breathability of 20,000g/m²/24h
Mechanical stretch: Stretch due to the mechanical assembly of the yarn construction
